content: materials - 3 skeins of purl soho s season alpaca 1 100% baby alpaca each skein is 218 yards/ 100 grams approximately 625 yards required we made one cowl in heirloom white and one in dove gray - us 5 3 75 mm 24-inch circular needles 2 - us 5 16-inch circular needles gauge - unblocked 40 stitches x 28 row/ rounds = 4 inches in 2 x 2 rib unstretched - blocked 37 stitches x 30 row/ rounds = 4 inches in 2 x 2 rib unstretched size finished width at bottom from one side of split to other unstretched - unblocked 28 inches - blocked 30 inches finished circumference at top unstretched - unblocked 18 inches - blocked 20 inches finished height from bottom to top unstretched - unblocked 17 1/2 inches - blocked 16 1/2 inches 1 https //www purlsoho com/season-alpaca html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796
